trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"></xref> that is associated with the properties that are bound, or can be bound, on an activity.
trans-unit.target: Representa um <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"> </xref> que estão associado com as propriedades que estão vinculados ou podem estar vinculadas numa atividade.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] When users indicate that they want to edit property values, the **ActivityBind** dialog box opens to help in specifying the binding of properties on an activity.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Quando os utilizadores a indicar que pretende editar valores de propriedade, o **ActivityBind** é aberta a caixa de diálogo para ajudar a especificar o enlace de propriedades numa atividade.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.BindUITypeEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.BindUITypeEditor"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Edits the value of the specified object using the editor style indicated by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.BindUITypeEditor.GetEditStyle*>.
trans-unit.target: Edita o valor do objeto especificado utilizando o estilo de editor indicado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.BindUITypeEditor.GetEditStyle*>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.BindUITypeEditor.GetEditStyle*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que podem ser utilizados para obter informações de contexto adicional.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IServiceProvider> that the editor can use to obtain services.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IServiceProvider>que o editor pode utilizar para obter serviços.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: The value of the object to edit.
trans-unit.target: O valor do objeto para editar.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the object.
serviceProvider contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: serviceProvidercontém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Returns the editor style used by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.BindUITypeEditor.EditValue*> method.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o estilo de editor utilizado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.BindUITypeEditor.EditValue*>método.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.BindUITypeEditor.EditValue*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que podem ser utilizados para obter informações de contexto adicional.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"></xref> value that indicates the style of editor used by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.BindUITypeEditor.EditValue*>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"> </xref> valor que indica o estilo do editor utilizado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.BindUITypeEditor.EditValue*>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.BindUITypeEditor.EditValue*>
